Description: Leather sandal, probably left foot, complete except for the loss of the lower sole. Sole stitched all round rim for attachment to lower sole. Sole shaped with narrowed waist and upturned rear ends with holes to take the ties. Decorative projection survives between them. Repaired at the waist. Ties a leather strap 1cm wide. Slight wear under the heel.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House 24 Room 1 Floor 4 pit fill
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN364201001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
